2009890.name: RPG Maker MZ - KR Legendary Palaces - Golem Tileset
2009890.description:
Carve out a dungeon deep in the stone of the earth! Grab this Golem tileset for RPG Maker!

This Golem Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Multiple sand tiles with light, mid-tone and dark variations
Blue tiled floor
Red grass
Stone spike traps
Grunge tiles
Pit tiles
Cracks and rocks

Walls:

Wall tiles in all shades of sand, plus blue tile. Includes matching roofs for all wall types.

Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
small accent pillars with and without jewels
large accent pillars (plain and themed) with jewels
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
magical-looking window (small and large)
treasure box (with animated version)
push block
bridge rails
multiple statues – large and small
magic rings
diagonal stairs
3 designs of ladders
stalagmite wall “art”
matching jewels
plus more!

Events and Animations

Treasure chest and blue fire!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
2009890.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
